docs.lead_paragraph: THE quest of the golden laugh has been the favorite indoor sport of both playgoers and producers this season. Never in the history of the local stage has the bromide that people go to the theatre to be amused,...

headline.main: The Funniest Things in the Current Plays; Lines to be Heard Just Now in New York's Theatres Which Have Succeeded in Getting Heartiest Laughs from Audiences
